tasks.title: Fix Jobber OAuth Token
tasks.description: Refresh token expired. Need to re-authenticate in n8n → Credentials → Jobber OAuth2 → Reconnect. Then update local credentials.

tasks.title: Daily 6PM Jobber Schedule Cron
tasks.description: Cron job runs but fails silently when Jobber token is dead. Blocked until token is refreshed.

tasks.title: SOP Voice Notes
tasks.description: Record voice notes about SOPs on drive to Washington job. Focus on 'don't do this' stuff for new employees — things that cost money when done wrong. Send recordings to Clawd for formatting.

tasks.title: Call Louis Schmidt
tasks.description: Follow up call with Louis Schmidt. Reminder set for Feb 20 at 9 AM.

tasks.title: Replit Subscription — Renew or Cancel
tasks.description: Subscription expires Feb 25. Decide whether to renew or cancel before getting charged.

tasks.title: Mission Control Task Board
tasks.description: Build task board UI, push to GitHub, deploy via GitHub Pages.
